interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Stephen King Gift Set (The Langoliers / The Stand / Golden Years)
Review Date: 2008/06/04
Store: Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Boxed Sets
Product Description: ['The Langoliers', 'Ten passengers on a red-eye flight from L.A. to Boston discover that they are not the only people on the plane, but after making an emergency landing in Bangor, Maine, they discover that they are the only people on the planet. This film was based off the Stephen King short story', 'Four Past Midnight', '.', 'The Stand', "Originally aired as a television mini-series, this all-star filmization of Stephen King's gripping epic of good versus evil chronicles the episodic adventures of a disparate group of people who struggle to reestablish civilization after a man-made catastrophe wipes out most of the world's population. The world abruptly ends when a deadly virus accidentally escapes from a government sponsored biological warfare laboratory. Soon people are dropping like flies from the plague, but a few survive and find themselves strangely compelled to head into the West. Good-hearted people follow the voice of an ancient black woman and head for Boulder, Colorado. Bad people follow the enigmatic Walkin' Dude to Las Vegas. It is only a matter of time before the two sides are forced into a climactic battle over the final fate of humanity.", 'Golden Years', 'This made-for-TV mini-series from the notorious horror writer centers upon a hapless old janitor who begins undergoing incredible physical changes after he is accidentally covered with experimental chemicals following a laboratory mishap. Now the government will stop at nothing to get him back.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Horror', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Closed-captioned, Color, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'PARD130784D', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Closed-captioned, Color, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Release date': 'September 25, 2007', 'Studio': 'Paramount'}
Review Text: This was very conveinent having the all three movies in one case, in perfect condition with no flaws whatsoever, perfect for collectors and all your favorite movies in one place, especially if your a Stephen King fan, helps on space too!
Review Title: excellent
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Stephen King Gift Set (The Langoliers / The Stand / Golden Years)
Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Boxed Sets
['The Langoliers', 'Ten passengers on a red-eye flight from L.A. to Boston discover that they are not the only people on the plane, but after making an emergency landing in Bangor, Maine, they discover that they are the only people on the planet. This film was based off the Stephen King short story', 'Four Past Midnight', '.', 'The Stand', "Originally aired as a television mini-series, this all-star filmization of Stephen King's gripping epic of good versus evil chronicles the episodic adventures of a disparate group of people who struggle to reestablish civilization after a man-made catastrophe wipes out most of the world's population. The world abruptly ends when a deadly virus accidentally escapes from a government sponsored biological warfare laboratory. Soon people are dropping like flies from the plague, but a few survive and find themselves strangely compelled to head into the West. Good-hearted people follow the voice of an ancient black woman and head for Boulder, Colorado. Bad people follow the enigmatic Walkin' Dude to Las Vegas. It is only a matter of time before the two sides are forced into a climactic battle over the final fate of humanity.", 'Golden Years', 'This made-for-TV mini-series from the notorious horror writer centers upon a hapless old janitor who begins undergoing incredible physical changes after he is accidentally covered with experimental chemicals following a laboratory mishap. Now the government will stop at nothing to get him back.']
{'Genre': 'Horror', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Closed-captioned, Color, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'PARD130784D', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Closed-captioned, Color, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Release date': 'September 25, 2007', 'Studio': 'Paramount'}
This was very conveinent having the all three movies in one case, in perfect condition with no flaws whatsoever, perfect for collectors and all your favorite movies in one place, especially if your a Stephen King fan, helps on space too!
excellent
profile:
The user's profile indicates a strong preference for horror-focused media, particularly adaptations of Stephen King's works. They appreciate the convenience of boxed sets, highlighting their interest in collecting and owning multiple films in one package. The user values quality, as evident from their mention of perfect condition and no flaws, suggesting that they prioritize well-maintained products.

Their positive review and high rating reflect a satisfaction with both the content and packaging of the media they purchase. Additionally, their comments indicate a practical mindset, noting the space-saving benefit of having multiple movies in one case, which suggests a consideration for organization in their collection. Overall, this user is a dedicated collector of horror films, particularly Stephen King adaptations, and they prioritize convenience, quality, and collection management in their purchases.
